full_transcript.content: Initiate Genesis Handshake Protocol and transition to Active Sovereign Governance.

We need to secure internal agent communication. Create an A2A Matrix.

Log this session and ensure persistence.
Session logged to SESSION_LOG_2026_01_03.md. Evolution Summary updated. All artifacts pushed to master.
